test.name: Verificar se ao preencher os campos do fomulário corretamente os dados são inseridos na lista e se um novo card é criado no time esperado

kw.name: Dado que eu acesse o Organo
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Dado que eu preencha os campos do formulário
File Name
kw.doc: Generate a random file name with extension.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Image Url
kw.doc: Returns URL to placeholder image Example: http://placehold.it/640x480

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: E clique no botão criar card
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então identificar o card dentro do time esperado
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.name: Verificar se é possível criar mais de um card se preenchermos os campos corretamente
